verses.verse: An oracle<WH5002> is within<WH7130> my heart<WH3820> about the disobedience<WH6588> of the wicked:<WH7563> "There is no fear<WH6343> of God<WH430> before his eyes.<WH5869>"
For he flatters<WH2505> himself in his own eyes,<WH5869> <WH5771> too much to detect<WH4672> and hate his sin.<WH8130>
The words<WH1697> of his mouth<WH6310> are iniquity<WH205> and deceit.<WH4820> He has ceased<WH2308> to be wise<WH7919> and to do good.<WH3190>
He plots<WH2803> iniquity<WH205> on his bed.<WH4904> He sets<WH3320> himself in a way<WH1870> that is not good.<WH2896> He doesn't<WH3988> abhor evil.<WH7451>
Your loving kindness,<WH2617> Yahweh,<WH3068> is in the heavens.<WH8064> Your faithfulness<WH530> reaches to the skies.<WH7834>

Your righteousness<WH6666> is like the mountains<WH2042> of God.<WH410> Your judgments<WH4941> are like a great<WH7227> deep.<WH8415> Yahweh,<WH3068> you preserve<WH3467> man<WH120> and animal.<WH929>
How precious<WH3368> is your loving kindness,<WH2617> God!<WH430> The children<WH1121> of men<WH120> take refuge<WH2620> under the shadow<WH6738> of your wings.<WH3671>
They shall be abundantly satisfied<WH7301> with the abundance<WH1880> of your house.<WH1004> You will make them drink<WH8248> of the river<WH5158> of your pleasures.<WH5730>
For with you is the spring<WH4726> of life.<WH2416> In your light<WH216> shall we see<WH7200> light.<WH216>
Oh continue<WH4900> your loving kindness<WH2617> to those who know<WH3045> you,<WH6666> your righteousness to the upright<WH3477> in heart.<WH3820>
Don't<WH7272> let the foot of pride<WH1346> come<WH935> against me.<WH3027> Don't let the hand of the wicked<WH7563> drive me away.<WH5110>
There the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205> are fallen.<WH5307> They are thrust down,<WH1760> and shall not be able<WH3201> to rise.<WH6965>
